thread.title: The Prodigy, Groove Armada, Jungle will play Snowbombing 2016 - Music
thread.title_full: The Prodigy, Groove Armada, Jungle will play Snowbombing 2016 - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Lewis Corner
title: The Prodigy, Groove Armada, Jungle will play Snowbombing 2016 - Music
text: You've got just over five months to get your skiing technique up to scratch, because Snowbombing Festival has announced its first wave of acts.The snow sports and music event will return to the Austrian ski resort of Mayrhofen for the week April 4-9, 2016, for a 12th year. The Prodigy, Andy C, Jungle, Groove Armada (DJ set), Oliver Heldens, Netsky, Wilkinson (DJ set) and Hannah Wants are the first wave of dance music titans confirmed to be performing.They join the likes of Bondax, Hot Since 82, T Williams, Ben Pearce and Bicep on the growing line-up.The shows will take place across Snowbombing's unique venues scattered amongst the Austrian alps, including The Forest Party stage, the Racket Club and a mountaintop igloo 6,000 feet above sea level. © Danny North Early bird packages are on sale now and start from £249 for five nights' accommodation and a festival wristband.Rudimental, Fatboy Slim, Sigma and 2ManyDJs were a handful of the big names who performed at Snowbombing last year, which we described as "the hottest show on snow".
